description: A classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil. Ingredients include wheat flour, olive oil, yeast, and tomato sauce. Baked to perfection in a wood-fired oven.
An assortment of fresh sushi rolls and nigiri. Ingredients include sushi rice, nori, salmon, tuna, and avocado. Served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
Corn tortillas filled with marinated pork, pineapple, and cilantro. Ingredients include pork shoulder, adobo spices, pineapple, and lime juice. Grilled and served hot.
Tender chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce. Ingredients include chicken, butter, cream, and a blend of Indian spices. Served with naan or basmati rice.
Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, eggs, and peanuts. Ingredients include tamarind paste, fish sauce, and palm sugar. Garnished with lime and fresh herbs.
Slow-cooked beef stew with red wine, mushrooms, and onions. Ingredients include beef chuck, Burgundy wine, carrots, and thyme. Served with crusty bread.
Roasted duck served with thin pancakes, hoisin sauce, and scallions. Ingredients include duck, soy sauce, and five-spice powder. Prepared using traditional techniques.
A juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, and tomato. Ingredients include ground beef, cheese, sesame bun, and condiments. Grilled to perfection.
A traditional rice dish with chicken, rabbit, and green beans. Ingredients include bomba rice, saffron, olive oil, and paprika. Cooked in a large shallow pan.
A sweet pastry made with layers of phyllo dough, nuts, and honey. Ingredients include pistachios, walnuts, butter, and sugar syrup. Baked until golden and crisp.
